SELECT board_no boardNo, board_title boardTitle, member_id memberId, board_date boardDate, board_pic boardPic, board_content boardContent FROM board WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( board_title, member_id, board_date, board_content, board_pic ) VALUES ( #{boardTitle}, #{memberId}, NOW(), #{boardContent}, #{boardPic} )
